title: The Key
author: The Key
content: Staking is a modern convenient form of passive income that you receive by storing cryptocurrency.By its principle of operation, staking is somewhat similar to a bank deposit - the user transfers money to the account for a certain period, does nothing with them, and they bring him passive income.  And the more you store in staking, the higher the regular level of profit.In addition to this basic scheme of work, the staking of individual blockchains may have its own conditions.Staking on The Key platform: conditions ✔️Staking and profitability calculation is done in USDT ✔️Withdrawal of remuneration and staked USDT at the end of the stacking period is carried out at the current exchange rate at the time of withdrawal in SOUR tokens. ✔️Reinvestment occurs once a month, while the staking period does not increase. ✔️Distribution of remuneration from staking - 75% to the tokenholder, 25% according to the marketing plan in accordance with the qualification.Bonuses accrued depending on the terms of staking: 6 months - 5% per month 9 months - 7% per month 12 months - 9% per month 24 months - 12% per monthLearn important news from the Metaverse world on our Telegram channel t.me/+D0mZ6GSk_RE2ZmRi

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: You telling me, we can roi within a year if we stake there? Sounds like scam.

comments.author: The Key
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on December 21, 2022, 08:01:29 AMYou telling me, we can roi within a year if we stake there? Sounds like scam. Or is it an opportunity to diversify your investments.Quote from: digaran on December 21, 2022, 08:01:29 AMYou telling me, we can roi within a year if we stake there? Sounds like scam.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on December 21, 2022, 08:01:29 AMYou telling me, we can roi within a year if we stake there? Sounds like scam.Looks like a fast route to losing everything to me. An opportunity not to be missed. In all seriousness yes, if it looks & smells like shit then it usually is a pile of stinking shit. Staking is at best risky & at worst a scam. It’s just not worth the risk.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: What is staking?Has to do with setting up your tent when you are intending to do Ethereum-based, altcoin trading over a satellite Internet connection out in the wild lands.

comments.body: Yes it is good today because the procedure is too much costly nowdays.
